item.description:
To Catch a Thief (1955)

Let's meet outside Arizona Pizza at 6:45 pm. The movie starts at 7:00 pm.

 

This is part of Cinemark's Classic Movie Series.

Runtime: 106 min
MPAA Rating: NR

Starring: Cary Grant, Grace Kelly, Jessie Royce Landis, John Williams, Charles Vanel

Genre: Suspense/Thriller Romance

Synopsis: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence.

 

For anyone who wants to meet afterwards for discussion and drinks or light food, Arizona Pizza is right across from the theater.
item.name: To Catch a Thief
